name: ミンク
message: "You're going back down with them."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What? What are you talking about?"

name: ミンク
message: "I can handle the rest on my own."
Instantly, the blood rushes to my head.
After everything, he's saying that now?
I know he's trying to push me away.
Before, I'd have just been angry that he was ordering me around. But now, it's different.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm coming with you."

name: ミンク
message: "...Tch. I don't have time for this. Hey!"
After a moment, Mink's bird appears from down the hall.
It lands on his shoulder. He quickly grabs it and pops the AI chip out of its belly.
The chip is a thin, two-centimeter square card, containing all the core data for his Allmate.
He slips it into a slot on the dashboard of his bike, then turns the key again.
This time, the engine starts.
Without batting an eyelash, he tosses the bird's motionless body aside.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! What the fuck?!"

name: ミンク
message: "That's just the frame. He's in here now."

name: トリ
message: "Don't worry."
The bird's voice issues from the bike's speakers.
Oh. Of course.

name: トリ
message: "We planned for this."

name: ミンク
message: "How's it feel?"

name: トリ
message: "Not bad."
Mink gently taps the bike's side with the palm of his hand, then leans close to the dashboard and whispers something I can't hear.
He straightens.

name: ミンク
message: "You handle the rest."

name: トリ
message: "Got it."
Suddenly, the bike takes off down the hall. Cops scream as they crunch beneath its tires.
The members of Scratch cheer as the cops―those who can move―make a frantic attempt to escape.

name: ミンク
message: "Let's go."
Mink grabs my arm. We slip away from the decidedly one-sided brawl, heading for the stairs. A man shouts after me.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Hey! Blue! You better have his back!"
I turn and give him a nod.

name: 悪島
message: "GEEEEEET BAAACK HEEEEEERE!"
Akushima's roar fades behind us.
